mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_img, notice_category, groups) values(resetnotice_seq.nextval,#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5}, resetnotice_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_title, to_char(notice_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')notice_time, notice_content, notice_img, notice_category from notice order by groups DESC
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{param1}, notice_content=#{param2}, notice_img=#{param3}, notice_writer=#{param4}, notice_time=SYSTIMESTAMP, notice_category=#{param5} where notice_no=#{param6}
mapper.insert: insert into personal_qna (personal_no, personal_title, personal_content, personal_img, personal_name, personal_id, personal_email,personal_category) values (personal_no.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7})
mapper.select: select swindle_no, swindle_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at from swindle order by groups DESC
select swindle_no, swindle_title, to_char(create_at,'yyyy/MM/dd')create_at, case_content, case_img, swindle_cnt, victim_id, suspect_id from swindle where swindle_no=#{param1}
